data.text: @Scelux Details of the new quarantine requirements (effective on March 1) can be found on MHLW’s website at https://t.co/McxtskhsZl . If you have further inquiries, please contact the MHLW call center listed on the webpage directly.
@ACSTokyo When I enter, if I test negative, I won’t have to quarantine then. That’s huge…
@KinKoiiCh Assuming you are traveling from a non-designated country, including the United States, the quarantine will be at your home or a hotel.
@ACSTokyo We had a trip planned 23-30 since a year and half ago— we rescheduled till next year again we really wanted to go for cherry blossom season :(

@directorlukeh If you can't for health reasons, people with organ transplants; chemotherapy; there are medical waivers.
Otherwise cry harder.

@Gouki_in_Japan @ACSTokyo What if you can't take the vaccine due to health reasons? Maybe Japan also shouldn't move on from the fax machine as well. The entire world is opening up, this little island country needs to follow along, everyone is going to be hit by covid in some way or another.
